### IJointOutput.Clear method
</br>


#### Clears the buffered content (and console surface) and moves the cursor to the top (0,0).

```csharp
public IJointOutput Clear()
```

### Return Value

The same [`IJointOutput`](../IJointOutput.md) instance for chaining.
